text: Ma e aha maa digau ala ne lloomoi le e mmaadagu i digau ala e noho i tenua deelaa, gei digaula guu hau hua di nadau gowaa dudu tigidaumaha i di gowaa hua dela nogo duu iei di maa i mua. Malaa, digaula gu daamada guu hai nadau tigidaumaha ala e dudu i hongo di maa, i nia luada mo hiahi.3.3 Numbers 28.1-8
